snippet: The ministers agreed to require companies to rotate ratings agencies, though the rules still must be approved by governments and the European Parliament.
abstract: European Union finance ministers agree to require companies to rotate ratings agencies, though the rules still must be approved by governments and the European Parliament.
lead_paragraph: The ministers agreed to require companies to rotate ratings agencies, though the rules still must be approved by governments and the European Parliament.

headline.seo: European Finance Ministers Clear Way for Credit Rating Competition
headline.main: Finance Ministers Clear Way for Credit Rating Competition in Europe
